text: Kellie Noelle Martin (b. October 16 1975 near Riverside, California) is an American television actress. She is known for playing Lucy Knight in the NBC television series ER. ==Awards and nominations== Year Association Category Nominated work Result 1990 Young Artist Awards Best Young Actress Starring in a Television Series Life Goes On 1991 Young Artist Awards Best Young Actress Starring in a Television Series Life Goes On 1992 Young Artist Awards Best Young Actress Starring in a Television Series Life Goes On Viewers for Quality Television Best Supporting Actress in a Quality Drama Series Life Goes On 1993 Emmy Awards Outstanding Supporting Actress in a Drama Series Life Goes On 1999 Screen Actors Guild Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series ER (shared with cast) 2000 Screen Actors Guild Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series ER (shared with cast) Screen Actors Guild Outstanding Performance by an Ensemble in a Drama Series ER (shared with cast) == References == ==Other websites== * Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American voice actors Category:Actors from Riverside County, California Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:People from Riverside, California
title: Kellie Martin
